name: dragon-dance
effect: Raises the user’s Attack and Speed by one stage each.
short_effect: Raises the user’s Attack and Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.

flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.
